name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest
description:
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Giant,
grey trees loom ominously on all sides.  The path continues east and south.

exits.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

extra_descriptions.description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.

The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
